name: Subscriber Stats For Mailpoet
author: Sparkjoy Studios

sections.description: This plugin simply adds in a page to view the statistics associated with a single subscriber. From the MP Subscriber Statistics menu item, you can view a chart.js graph of their stats, and filter a list of all the newsletters sent to them.
sections.installation:
Minimum requirements

PHP version 5.6 or greater.

There are 3 ways to install this plugin:

1. Install Through WordPress

  1. In your WordPress dashboard, navigate to Plugins > Add New
  2. Search for Mailpoet Subscriber Overview
  3. Click on “install now”
  4. Activate the plugin
  5. A new MP Subscriber Statistics menu will appear in your WordPress dashboard

2. Zip File

  1. Download the plugin (.zip file) by using the blue “download” button underneath the plugin banner at the top
  2. In your WordPress dashboard, navigate to Plugins > Add New
  3. Click on “Upload Plugin”
  4. Upload the .zip file
  5. Activate the plugin
  6. A new MP Subscriber Statistic menu will appear in your WordPress dashboard

3. FTP

  1. Download the plugin (.zip file) by using the blue “download” button underneath the plugin banner at the top
  2. Extract the archive and then upload, via FTP, the mailpoet folder to the <WP install folder>/wp-content/plugins/ folder on your host
  3. Activate the plugin
  4. A new MP Subscriber Statistic menu will appear in your WordPress dashboard
sections.faq:
What is the purpose of this plugin?

Simply to add in additional stats for users who are making use of Mailpoet 3.
sections.changelog:
1.0

  • Intial Commit of the Plugin
  • Added a page to retrieve subscriber stats from Mailpoet 3

short_description: A plugin to provide a simple statistics page for Mailpoet 3 Subscribers.
description: This plugin simply adds in a page to view the statistics associated with a single subscriber. From the MP Subscriber Statistics menu item, you can view a chart.js graph of their stats, and filter a list of all the newsletters sent to them.
